revised_title: The Kinetic Theory of Simple and Composite Monatomic Gases: Viscosity, Thermal Conduction, and Diffusion
tldr: This paper by S. Chapman and J. Larmor investigates the kinetic theory of simple and composite monatomic gases, focusing on viscosity, thermal conduction, and diffusion. They develop a method that yields results of complete formal generality and can be reduced to numerical form with comparatively little arithmetical labor.
